title: RPI Phase Result
description: Schema for phase-{N}-result.json artifacts emitted by the ao rpi phased orchestrator after each phase completes or fails.

schema_version.description: Schema version for forward compatibility. Current version: 1.

run_id.description: Unique identifier for this RPI run (hex string, matches worktree branch suffix).

retries.description: Number of retry attempts for this phase.

backend.description: Execution backend used for this phase.

artifacts.description: Map of artifact names to file paths produced by this phase.

verdicts.description: Map of gate names to verdict strings (PASS/WARN/FAIL).

started_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the phase started.

completed_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the phase completed.
